OrganizationContainer A container for Organizations ReferenceDataOrDataset Represents a resource in the Bridge2AI Standards Registry serving as a standa... ReferenceImplementation Represents an implementation of one or more standards or tools in the Bridge2... Registry Represents a resource in the Bridge2AI Standards Registry serving to curate a... SoftwareOrTool Represents a piece of software or computational tool in the Bridge2AI Standar... TrainingProgram Represents a training program for skills and experience related to standards ... docs.text: Class: DataSubstrate Represents a data substrate for Bridge2AI data. This may be a high-level data structure or a specific implementation of that structure. Interpret as "data, in this form or format", as compared to DataStandard, which refers to the set of rules defining a standard. For example, data in TSV format is represented as a DataSubstrate but the concept of TSV format is a DataStandard.
